metadata.name: Presence
metadata.description:
Title: Presence

Description: "The poetry of light" is a collection of photographs that captures the delicate beauty of golden hour. These images have a nostalgic, dreamy feel that transports the viewer to a peaceful, serene world.

With a focus on composition and light, each image tells a story and elicits a sense of longing for a simpler time.

These photographs invite the viewer to slow down and take a moment to appreciate the beauty of light. They are a reminder of the peace and serenity that can be found in the natural world, and a celebration of the magic of golden hour.

Artist: Bogdan Ianosi

Edition: 1/1

Location: Romania

Date: December 2020

License : Extended Editorial (Can be used to display  privately, or in commercial and non-commercial  settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The license includes unlimited  use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder .
